Detailed Description

Base class for all audio clip importers.

See also:
DzMultiMediaMgr

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzAudioImporter::DzAudioImporter ( const QString &  extension  ) 

Creates a new audio clip importer. Derived classes should call this constructor to set the extension that they read.

Parameters:
extension The file extension (type) that this importer reads from (excluding the preceeding '.').

Destructor.

Member Function Documentation

QString DzAudioImporter::getDescription (  )  const [pure virtual, slot]
Returns:
A description of the importer that can be placed in a file type selection combo box (e.g. "WAV Format").
QString DzAudioImporter::getExtension (  )  const [virtual, slot]
Returns:
The file extension (excluding the preceding dot) supported by this importer.

DzAudioClip *  clip 
) [slot]

Reads the file.

Parameters:
filename Name of the file to be read.
clip Audio clip to read data into.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.

DzAudioClip *  clip,
const DzFileIOSettings *  options

Reads the file.

Parameters:
filename Name of the file to be read.

Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.
bool DzAudioImporter::recognize ( const QString &  filename  )  const [pure virtual, slot]

Test the given filename and file contents to see if this importer can read it.

Parameters:
filename The name of the file to test.
Returns:
true if the importer can import the file, otherwise false.
